p.p: A subset of SNOMED CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent different assessment scales used to measure outcomes of assessment (for example Edinburgh postnatal depression scale, Waterlow pressure sore risk score etc...).

Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Scale subset with subset original id 6311000000138.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of the "Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
